text: I have a [[Cruel Tutor]] sitting in my binder I keep waffling on. I'm never gonna use it in a deck, and it's not on the RL so it could get reprinted at any time and be worth 3 bucks, but it's also almost worse than Diabolic Tutor so I could see it literally never being reprinted and doubling, too.

attachments.fallback: Cruel Tutor {2}{B} // Sorcery // Search your library for a card, then shuffle your library and put that card on top of it. You lose 2 life.
attachments.text:
Sorcery
Search your library for a card, then shuffle your library and put that card on top of it. You lose 2 life.
_The more you pay for the lesson, the better you'll remember it._
attachments.title: Cruel Tutor {2}{B}

text: Yeah that's a bit of an odd one. I've never held on to one for too long because the play value just isn't there for me. You could always trade it in for an RL card that you know will have more guaranteed value.
